The claim was posted by the entertainmen: Stop the World, The Teabaggers Want Off" along with an image of Wisconsin governor Scott Walker and a fictitious quotation attributed to him.
The quote in question suggested that Sco: Labor Unions don't deserve to have a national holiday. They've done more damage to our economy than any recession ever did. Labor Day should be replaced by Patriots Day, celebrated every year on 9/11."
The: Stop The World, The Teabaggers Want Off" Facebook group is described as a satire page, and their material is not meant to be taken seriously.
